![PRs Welcome](https://img.shields.io/badge/PRs-welcome-brightgreen) ![Python 3.9+](https://img.shields.io/badge/python-3.9%2B-blue) ![Component Driven](https://img.shields.io/badge/architecture-component--driven-orange) ![Desktop App](https://img.shields.io/badge/platform-desktop-lightgrey) ![CLI Support](https://img.shields.io/badge/CLI-supported-critical) ![Live Reload](https://img.shields.io/badge/live--reload-enabled-blue) ## Image Examples ![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/81d016e9-e10a-4438-ab94-99b6d76b8efe) ![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/154dc3f4-ea8c-4f6f-84d3-88c7ab74a46f) ![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/2318f701-6ec8-4402-abcc-40c879bf1a10) # WinUp üöÄ ## Make sure to download the Latest Stable Release (LSR) and not the latest/LFR! Current LSR: 2.4.9 `pip install winup==2.4.9` **A ridiculously Pythonic and powerful framework for building beautiful desktop applications.** WinUp is a modern UI framework for Python that wraps the power of PySide6 (Qt) in a simple, declarative, and developer-friendly API. It's designed to let you build applications faster, write cleaner code, and enjoy the development process. ### ‚ú® Now with Web Support! WinUp now also supports building fully interactive, stateful web applications using the same Python-centric, component-based approach. The web module uses FastAPI and WebSockets under the hood to bring the simplicity of WinUp to the browser. [Web Documentation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mebaadwaheed/winup/main/docs/web/README.md) > **Disclaimer:** Web support is an optional feature. To use it, you must install the web dependencies: > ```bash > pip install "winup[web]" > ``` [Contributing](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mebaadwaheed/winup/main/CONTRIBUTING.md) [Changelog](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mebaadwaheed/winup/main/CHANGELOG.md) [License](LICENSE) --- ## Why WinUp? (Instead of raw PySide6 or Tkinter) Desktop development in Python can feel clunky. WinUp was built to fix that. | Feature | WinUp Way ‚ú® | Raw PySide6 / Tkinter Way üòü | | ----------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | **Layouts** | `ui.Column(children=[...])`, `ui.Row(children=[...])` | `QVBoxLayout()`, `QHBoxLayout()`, `layout.addWidget()`, `pack()`, `grid()` | | **Styling** | `props={"background-color": "blue", "font-size": "16px"}` | Manual QSS strings, `widget.setStyleSheet(...)`, complex style objects. | | **State Management** | `state.bind(widget, "prop", "key")` | Manual callback functions, getters/setters, `StringVar()`, boilerplate everywhere. | | **Two-Way Binding** | `state.bind_two_way(input_widget, "key")` | Non-existent. Requires manual `on_change` handlers to update state and UI. | | **Developer Tools** | **Built-in Hot Reloading**, code profiler, and window tools out of the box. | Non-existent. Restart the entire app for every single UI change. | | **Code Structure** | Reusable, self-contained components with `@component`. | Often leads to large, monolithic classes or procedural scripts. | **In short, WinUp provides the "killer features" of modern web frameworks (like React or Vue) for the desktop, saving you time and letting you focus on what matters: your application's logic.** # üßä WinUp vs üß± PyEdifice (Reddit User Request) | Feature | WinUp | PyEdifice | |----------------------------------|--------------------------------------|----------------------------------| | üß± Architecture | React-style + state | React-style + state | | üåê Built-in Routing | ‚úÖ Yes (`Router(routes={...})`) | ‚ùå No built-in routing | | ‚ôªÔ∏è Lifecycle Hooks | ‚úÖ `on_mount`, `on_unmount`, etc. | ‚ö†Ô∏è Limited (`did_mount`, etc.) | | üé® Theming / Styling System | ‚úÖ Global & Scoped themes | ‚ùå Manual CSS injection | | üî≤ Layout Options | ‚úÖ Row, Column, Grid, Stack, Flexbox | ‚ö†Ô∏è Mostly Box & HBox/VBox | | üéûÔ∏è Animations | ‚úÖ Built-in (fade, scale, etc.) | ‚ùå None built-in | | üîÅ Hot Reloading (LHR) | ‚úÖ Stable + fast (`loadup dev`) | ‚ö†Ô∏è Experimental, limited support | | üì¶ Packaging | ‚úÖ With LoadUp (PyInstaller-based) | ‚ùå Must integrate PyInstaller manually | | üß© Component Reusability | ‚úÖ High, declarative | ‚úÖ High |

LSR atual: 2.4.9 `pip install winup==2.4.9` **Um framework ridiculamente Pythonic e poderoso para criar belos aplicativos desktop.** WinUp √© um framework de UI moderno para Python que envolve o poder do PySide6 (Qt) em uma API simples, declarativa e amig√°vel para desenvolvedores. Ele foi projetado para permitir que voc√™ crie aplicativos mais r√°pido, escreva c√≥digos mais limpos e aproveite o processo de desenvolvimento. ### ‚ú® Agora com Suporte Web! WinUp agora tamb√©m suporta a cria√ß√£o de aplica√ß√µes web totalmente interativas e com estado, usando a mesma abordagem centrada em Python e baseada em componentes. O m√≥dulo web usa FastAPI e WebSockets nos bastidores para trazer a simplicidade do WinUp ao navegador. [Documenta√ß√£o Web](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mebaadwaheed/winup/main/docs/web/README.md) > **Aviso:** O suporte web √© um recurso opcional. Para us√°-lo, voc√™ deve instalar as depend√™ncias web: > ```bash > pip install "winup[web]" > ``` [Contribuindo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mebaadwaheed/winup/main/CONTRIBUTING.md) [Changelog](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mebaadwaheed/winup/main/CHANGELOG.md) [Licen√ßa](LICENSE) --- ## Por que WinUp? (Em vez de PySide6 puro ou Tkinter) O desenvolvimento desktop em Python pode parecer desajeitado. O WinUp foi criado para resolver isso. | Recurso | Jeito WinUp ‚ú® | Jeito PySide6 / Tkinter Puro üòü | | ----------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | | **Layouts** | `ui.Column(children=[...])`, `ui.Row(children=[...])` | `QVBoxLayout()`, `QHBoxLayout()`, `layout.addWidget()`, `pack()`, `grid()` | | **Estiliza√ß√£o** | `props={"background-color": "blue", "font-size": "16px"}` | Strings QSS manuais, `widget.setStyleSheet(...)`, objetos de estilo complexos. | | **Gerenciamento de Estado** | `state.bind(widget, "prop", "key")` | Fun√ß√µes de callback manuais, getters/setters, `StringVar()`, boilerplate por toda parte. | | **Vincula√ß√£o Bidirecional** | `state.bind_two_way(input_widget, "key")` | Inexistente. Exige manipuladores `on_change` manuais para atualizar estado e UI. | | **Ferramentas do Desenvolvedor** | **Hot Reloading Embutido**, profiler de c√≥digo e ferramentas de janela prontas para uso. | Inexistente. Reinicie o app inteiro a cada altera√ß√£o de UI. | | **Estrutura do C√≥digo** | Componentes reutiliz√°veis e autocontidos com `@component`. | Geralmente resulta em classes grandes, monol√≠ticas ou scripts procedurais. | **Resumindo, o WinUp oferece os "recursos matadores" dos frameworks web modernos (como React ou Vue) para o desktop, economizando seu tempo e permitindo que voc√™ foque no que importa: a l√≥gica do seu aplicativo.** # üßä WinUp vs üß± PyEdifice (Pedido de Usu√°rio do Reddit) | Recurso | WinUp | PyEdifice | |----------------------------------|--------------------------------------|----------------------------------| | üß± Arquitetura | Estilo React + estado | Estilo React + estado | | üåê Roteamento Embutido | ‚úÖ Sim (`Router(routes={...})`) | ‚ùå Sem roteamento embutido | | ‚ôªÔ∏è Lifecycle Hooks | ‚úÖ `on_mount`, `on_unmount`, etc. | ‚ö†Ô∏è Limitado (`did_mount`, etc.) | | üé® Sistema de Temas / Estiliza√ß√£o| ‚úÖ Temas Globais & Locais | ‚ùå Inje√ß√£o de CSS manual | | üî≤ Op√ß√µes de Layout | ‚úÖ Row, Column, Grid, Stack, Flexbox | ‚ö†Ô∏è Principalmente Box & HBox/VBox | | üéûÔ∏è Anima√ß√µes | ‚úÖ Embutidas (fade, scale, etc.) | ‚ùå Nenhuma embutida | | üîÅ Hot Reloading (LHR) | ‚úÖ Est√°vel + r√°pido (`loadup dev`) | ‚ö†Ô∏è Experimental, suporte limitado | | üì¶ Empacotamento | ‚úÖ Com LoadUp (baseado em PyInstaller) | ‚ùå Precisa integrar PyInstaller manualmente | | üß© Reutiliza√ß√£o de Componentes | ‚úÖ Alta, declarativa | ‚úÖ Alta |

---

## Core Features

*   **Declarative & Pythonic UI:** Build complex layouts with simple `Row` and `Column` objects instead of clunky box layouts.
*   **Component-Based Architecture:** Use the `@component` decorator to create modular and reusable UI widgets from simple functions.
*   **Powerful Styling System:** Style your widgets with simple Python dictionaries using `props`. Create global "CSS-like" classes with `style.add_style_dict`.
*   **Full Application Shell:** Build professional applications with a declarative API for `MenuBar`, `ToolBar`, `StatusBar`, and `SystemTrayIcon`.
*   **Asynchronous Task Runner:** Run long-running operations in the background without freezing your UI using the simple `@tasks.run` decorator.
*   **Performance by Default:** Includes an opt-in `@memo` decorator to cache component renders and prevent needless re-computation.
*   **Advanced Extensibility:**
    *   **Widget Factory:** Replace any default widget with your own custom implementation (e.g., C++ based) using `ui.register_widget()`.
    *   **Multiple Windows:** Create and manage multiple independent windows for complex applications like tool palettes or music players.
*   **Reactive State Management:**
    *   **One-Way Binding:** Automatically update your UI when your data changes with `state.bind()`.
    *   **Two-Way Binding:** Effortlessly sync input widgets with your state using `state.bind_two_way()`.
    *   **Subscriptions:** Trigger any function in response to state changes with `state.subscribe()`.
*   **Developer-Friendly Tooling:**
    *   **Hot Reloading:** See your UI changes instantly without restarting your app.
    *   **Profiler:** Easily measure the performance of any function with the `@profiler.measure()` decorator.
    *   **Window Tools:** Center, flash, or manage your application window with ease.
*   **Built-in Routing:** Easily create multi-page applications with an intuitive, state-driven router.
*   **Flexible Data Layer:** Includes simple, consistent connectors for SQLite, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, and Firebase.

---

## Recursos Principais

*   **UI Declarativa & Pythonica:** Construa layouts complexos com objetos simples `Row` e `Column` ao inv√©s de layouts de caixas complicados.
*   **Arquitetura Baseada em Componentes:** Use o decorador `@component` para criar widgets de UI modulares e reutiliz√°veis a partir de fun√ß√µes simples.
*   **Sistema de Estiliza√ß√£o Poderoso:** Estilize seus widgets com dicion√°rios Python simples usando `props`. Crie classes globais "tipo CSS" com `style.add_style_dict`.
*   **Shell de Aplica√ß√£o Completo:** Construa aplicativos profissionais com uma API declarativa para `MenuBar`, `ToolBar`, `StatusBar` e `SystemTrayIcon`.
*   **Executor de Tarefas Ass√≠ncronas:** Execute opera√ß√µes longas em segundo plano sem travar sua UI usando o decorador simples `@tasks.run`.
*   **Performance por Padr√£o:** Inclui o decorador opcional `@memo` para armazenar em cache renderiza√ß√µes de componentes e evitar recomputa√ß√µes desnecess√°rias.
*   **Extensibilidade Avan√ßada:**
    *   **F√°brica de Widgets:** Substitua qualquer widget padr√£o por sua pr√≥pria implementa√ß√£o personalizada (por exemplo, baseada em C++) usando `ui.register_widget()`.
    *   **M√∫ltiplas Janelas:** Crie e gerencie v√°rias janelas independentes para aplicativos complexos como paletas de ferramentas ou players de m√∫sica.
*   **Gerenciamento de Estado Reativo:**
    *   **Vincula√ß√£o Unidirecional:** Atualize automaticamente sua UI quando seus dados mudarem com `state.bind()`.
    *   **Vincula√ß√£o Bidirecional:** Sincronize facilmente widgets de entrada com seu estado usando `state.bind_two_way()`.
    *   **Assinaturas:** Acione qualquer fun√ß√£o em resposta a mudan√ßas de estado com `state.subscribe()`.
*   **Ferramentas Amig√°veis para Desenvolvedores:**
    *   **Hot Reloading:** Veja suas altera√ß√µes de UI instantaneamente sem reiniciar o app.
    *   **Profiler:** Me√ßa facilmente a performance de qualquer fun√ß√£o com o decorador `@profiler.measure()`.
    *   **Ferramentas de Janela:** Centralize, pisque ou gerencie a janela do seu aplicativo com facilidade.
*   **Roteamento Integrado:** Crie facilmente aplica√ß√µes com m√∫ltiplas p√°ginas usando um roteador intuitivo e orientado a estado.
*   **Camada de Dados Flex√≠vel:** Inclui conectores simples e consistentes para SQLite, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB e Firebase.

RowTranslations.translatedContent: | üß† Curva de Aprendizado                | ‚úÖ F√°cil para usu√°rios de Python+React    | ‚úÖ F√°cil mas com menos ferramentas|

RowTranslations.originContent: *   **Declarative & Pythonic UI:** Build complex layouts with simple `Row` and `Column` objects instead of clunky box layouts.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: *   **UI Declarativa & Pythonica:** Construa layouts complexos com objetos simples `Row` e `Column` ao inv√©s de layouts de caixas complicados.

RowTranslations.originContent: *   **Component-Based Architecture:** Use the `@component` decorator to create modular and reusable UI widgets from simple functions.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: *   **Arquitetura Baseada em Componentes:** Use o decorador `@component` para criar widgets de UI modulares e reutiliz√°veis a partir de fun√ß√µes simples.

RowTranslations.originContent: *   **Powerful Styling System:** Style your widgets with simple Python dictionaries using `props`. Create global "CSS-like" classes with `style.add_style_dict`.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: *   **Sistema de Estiliza√ß√£o Poderoso:** Estilize seus widgets com dicion√°rios Python simples usando `props`. Crie classes globais "tipo CSS" com `style.add_style_dict`.

RowTranslations.originContent: *   **Full Application Shell:** Build professional applications with a declarative API for `MenuBar`, `ToolBar`, `StatusBar`, and `SystemTrayIcon`.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: *   **Shell de Aplica√ß√£o Completo:** Construa aplicativos profissionais com uma API declarativa para `MenuBar`, `ToolBar`, `StatusBar` e `SystemTrayIcon`.

RowTranslations.originContent: *   **Asynchronous Task Runner:** Run long-running operations in the background without freezing your UI using the simple `@tasks.run` decorator.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: *   **Executor de Tarefas Ass√≠ncronas:** Execute opera√ß√µes longas em segundo plano sem travar sua UI usando o decorador simples `@tasks.run`.

RowTranslations.originContent: *   **Performance by Default:** Includes an opt-in `@memo` decorator to cache component renders and prevent needless re-computation.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: *   **Performance por Padr√£o:** Inclui o decorador opcional `@memo` para armazenar em cache renderiza√ß√µes de componentes e evitar recomputa√ß√µes desnecess√°rias.

RowTranslations.originContent: *   **Widget Factory:** Replace any default widget with your own custom implementation (e.g., C++ based) using `ui.register_widget()`.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: *   **F√°brica de Widgets:** Substitua qualquer widget padr√£o por sua pr√≥pria implementa√ß√£o personalizada (por exemplo, baseada em C++) usando `ui.register_widget()`.

RowTranslations.originContent: *   **Multiple Windows:** Create and manage multiple independent windows for complex applications like tool palettes or music players.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: *   **M√∫ltiplas Janelas:** Crie e gerencie v√°rias janelas independentes para aplicativos complexos como paletas de ferramentas ou players de m√∫sica.

RowTranslations.originContent: *   **One-Way Binding:** Automatically update your UI when your data changes with `state.bind()`.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: *   **Vincula√ß√£o Unidirecional:** Atualize automaticamente sua UI quando seus dados mudarem com `state.bind()`.

RowTranslations.originContent: *   **Two-Way Binding:** Effortlessly sync input widgets with your state using `state.bind_two_way()`.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: *   **Vincula√ß√£o Bidirecional:** Sincronize facilmente widgets de entrada com seu estado usando `state.bind_two_way()`.

RowTranslations.originContent: *   **Subscriptions:** Trigger any function in response to state changes with `state.subscribe()`.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: *   **Assinaturas:** Acione qualquer fun√ß√£o em resposta a mudan√ßas de estado com `state.subscribe()`.

RowTranslations.originContent: *   **Hot Reloading:** See your UI changes instantly without restarting your app.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: *   **Hot Reloading:** Veja suas altera√ß√µes de UI instantaneamente sem reiniciar o app.

RowTranslations.originContent: *   **Profiler:** Easily measure the performance of any function with the `@profiler.measure()` decorator.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: *   **Profiler:** Me√ßa facilmente a performance de qualquer fun√ß√£o com o decorador `@profiler.measure()`.

RowTranslations.originContent: *   **Window Tools:** Center, flash, or manage your application window with ease.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: *   **Ferramentas de Janela:** Centralize, pisque ou gerencie a janela do seu aplicativo com facilidade.

RowTranslations.originContent: *   **Built-in Routing:** Easily create multi-page applications with an intuitive, state-driven router.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: *   **Roteamento Integrado:** Crie facilmente aplica√ß√µes com m√∫ltiplas p√°ginas usando um roteador intuitivo e orientado a estado.

RowTranslations.originContent: *   **Flexible Data Layer:** Includes simple, consistent connectors for SQLite, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, and Firebase.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: *   **Camada de Dados Flex√≠vel:** Inclui conectores simples e consistentes para SQLite, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB e Firebase.
